content.new: when a model doesn't have a collision model the raytracing for the orbit viewer's focal point ignores the object. ... might be a bug related to all models and not just without collision model actually.
content.old: when a model doesn't have a collision model the raytracing for the orbit viewer's focal point ignores the object.
